text: BTS is taking America by storm. The K - Pop boy band is internationally successful and are gaining lots of traction in the U. S. very quickly. Fans are completely and totally obsessed with the guys. No really, the BTS Army is unstoppable, supportive and incredibly loyal. If you aren't part of the Army we have a feeling, that might change sooner rather than later. The boys, RM, Jin, Suga, Jungkook, V, J - Hope and Jimin, are beginning to do their rounds making stops at all of the most popular talk shows.
